alert.note: Alert for Johnson (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 5:32PM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Johnson County through 545 PM CDT... At 531 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 5 miles east of Crab Orchard, or 6 miles west of Tecumseh, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree branches and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Tecumseh around 540 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
